channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Fusion HCI
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Fusion HCI

item.title: CVE-2023-43040|2024-08-02T19:37:23.028Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20fusion%20hci
item.description: IBM Spectrum Fusion HCI 2.5.2 through 2.7.2 could allow an attacker to perform unauthorized actions in RGW for Ceph due to improper bucket access. IBM X-Force ID: 266807.
